title: 206 - 5 Steps to Finding Your Style with Darren Booth
description:
When I think of artistic style, I think of Canadian illustrator Darren Booth. In my opinion, not many folks practicing today have as clear of an artistic voice as Darren.

In this episode Darren walks us through how he developed this unique and authentic style. We also get to chat about the ups and downs of being a full time freelance illustrator, as well as the lessons he's learned through the journey.

You're gonna love this one!

Darren Booth
darrenbooth.com
Instagram: @darrenbooth

CREDITS

Thanks to Yoni Wolf and the band WHY? for our theme music.

Thanks to Alex Sugg for editing and the podcast!
www.alexsugg.com

SPONSORS
